participant_1.background:
I've been with my girlfriend Luis for almost a year.
my favorite food is a burger.
I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
i listen to death metal.
i m constantly making short films with the camcorder my parents got me.

participant_2.background:
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i am not very good at playing basketball.
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i eat tuna fish salad at least every day.

content.text: Just taking a break from working on my opera piece.  What are you doing today?
I'm taking a break from making a short film.  What do you like about opera?
I love how it takes me to another world.  What type of short film are you making?
It's about a family who moves to a new town and tries to adjust to their new life.
That sounds really interesting.  How long are you planning on making it?
I'm not sure yet.  I'm just going to keep going until I feel like it's done.
That's the best way to do it.  What type of music do you listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is death metal.
That's a pretty intense genre.  I like techno music.  It helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
I can see how that would help.  I used to play basketball, but I wasn't very good.
Neither am I.  I'm more of a spectator than a player.  Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet.  I might go swimming or go to the movies.  What are you doing?
I'm going to the opera with my family.  We go every weekend.  What's your favorite food?
I love burgers.  They're my favorite food.
I like them too.  I eat tuna fish salad at least once a day.
That's a lot of tuna fish.  I could never eat it that often.
I know.  It's kind of weird.  But I love it.
